title: FocusBoard - A Modern Task Manager
description: A feature-rich personal productivity dashboard built with Vanilla JavaScript (ES6+). Integrates RESTful APIs (Weather, Quotes) and LocalStorage for state persistence to power a custom Pomodoro timer, daily planner, and dynamic to-do list.

title: DesignStudio - Design your idea
description: A browser-based vector design tool built with Vanilla JavaScript (ES6+). Designed as a lightweight alternative to tools like Figma, this project implements a custom virtual DOM-like rendering engine to handle complex object manipulation (resize, rotate, drag), layer management, and a robust undo/redo history stack without external dependencies.
